devDependenciesComments.gulp-terser: Used for code minification (supports ES6), Repo Link: https://github.com/duan602728596/gulp-terser#readme
devDependenciesComments.gulp-strip-import-export: Removes import export syntax so JS can be executed on the browser, Repo Link: https://github.com/elliot-nelson/gulp-strip-import-export
devDependenciesComments.jest: Used for testing the product code, Framework Link: https://jestjs.io/
devDependenciesComments.@types/jest: Needed in order to allow correct interaction between ESLint and Jest functions and types, Package Link: https://www.npmjs.com/package/@types/jest
devDependenciesComments.eslint-plugin-jest: Supports eslint configuration for jest, Repo Link: https://github.com/jest-community/eslint-plugin-jest
devDependenciesComments.babel-jest: pre-processor used to convert es6 code found in *.tests.js files to es2015 (so jest can execute it), additional info: https://www.npmjs.com/package/babel-jest/
devDependenciesComments.@babel/preset-env: Used by babel for javascript transpiling into es2015
